channel.title: I'm such a noob. ( NOT SPAM! )
channel.description:
[b]OMFG!!!!![/b]
lol. ok you have to get this. I was talking to my friend in rl about the bounty hunter update and i was like "oh yea thats cool lets try it out" ans he said you kept your items.... Well i went in there with a fury and full rune and i had a red skull over me i was like WTF! and all these level 100's just whored on me... 10 minutes later i had someone message me " i got your fury " I just broke down lol..... well i just thought you;d like to know that im a total dumbass...... post bout your mistakes on rs too please so i dont feel so retarted.... lol
